mapper.insert: insert into ordersdetail (OrderId, Cpid, Express, Ostate, Onum) values (#{orderid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cpid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{express,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ostate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{onum,jdbcType=INTEGER})
